A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An unfortunate disappointment. There are some excellent action sequences\, though they are limited in number\, and the movie itself is beautiful\, but the story is where the problems reside. The movie felt like it was around 30 minutes too long\, which was exacerbated by the fact that many characters were completely wasted and entire subplots were unnecessary. A missed opportunity to build off of the momentum of TFA
